qas.question: What percentage of the October 2003 vote was in favor of a recall?
Who was Schwarzenegger's closest rival in the gubernatorial race of 2003?
By about what number of votes did Schwarzenegger win the 2003 recall election in California?
What percentage of the vote did Schwarzenegger's opponent Bustamante receive?
Who was the first governor of California who had been born in a foreign country?

context: On October 7, 2003, the recall election resulted in Governor Gray Davis being removed from office with <a0_0>55.4%<a0_0/> of the Yes vote in favor of a recall. Schwarzenegger was elected Governor of California under the second question on the ballot with 48.6% of the vote to choose a successor to Davis. Schwarzenegger defeated Democrat <a1_0>Cruz Bustamante<a1_0/>, fellow Republican Tom McClintock, and others. His nearest rival, Bustamante, received <a3_0>31%<a3_0/> of the vote. In total, Schwarzenegger won the election by about <a2_0>1.3 million<a2_0/> votes. Under the regulations of the California Constitution, no runoff election was required. Schwarzenegger was the second foreign-born governor of California after Irish-born Governor <a4_0>John G. Downey<a4_0/> in 1862.
